title: Noam Chomsky Quotes|| life lesson Quotes || Quotes for life..||#noamchomsky
description:
_____________________________ABOUT VIDEO ______________________

Avram Noam Chomsky is an American public intellectual: a linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist. Sometimes called "the father of modern linguistics", Chomsky is also a major figure in analytic philosophy and one of the founders of the field of cognitive science.
